Class GeoLocHelper

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.BaseHelper
us.mn.state.dot.tms.GeoLocHelper
public class GeoLocHelper extends BaseHelper
GeoLocHelper has static methods for dealing with geo locations.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

      public static String getCrossLandmark(GeoLoc l)
      Get cross street / landmark label.
      Parameters:
      l - The location.
      Returns:
      Cross-street if specified, followed by landmark in parentheses, if specified. Cross-street modifier is only prepended if not "@".

      public static MapVector calculateVector(GeoLoc loc_a, GeoLoc loc_b)
      Calculate the vector from one location to another.
      Parameters:
      loc_a - Starting location.
      loc_b - Ending location.
      Returns:
      Vector from loc_a to loc_b, or null.

    • snapSegment

      public static GeoLoc snapSegment(GeoLoc l0, GeoLoc l1, SphericalMercatorPosition smp)
      Snap a point to a line segment on the map.
      Parameters:
      l0 - First end of line segment.
      l1 - Second end of line segment.
      smp - Selected point (spherical mercator position).
      Returns:
      GeoLoc snapped to line segment.
